document.title: Viewing information about a cluster
document.paragraph:
1Viewing information about a clusterTo view information about a cluster, you have to center the context tool on this component. Then the
../../../reference/60_metric_tool/00_introduction.xml metric tool will provide a complete set of measures that you will able to compute.
See Also
../10_searching/10_looking_for_a_cluster.xml Looking for a cluster
../../70_analyzing_a_project/00_introduction.xml Analysing a project
